setup: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided CSS variables for the 'Midnight Soul' theme.
Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' for icons and animations.
Ensure 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' fonts are imported (via Google Fonts in index.css).
layout_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use the provided deep navy/charcoal hex codes.
Use 'glass_surface' class for all floating panels (nav, chat input, modals).
Ensure the 'Chat Interface' feels like a premium messaging app (WhatsApp meets Vogue).
The 'Match Feed' should feel like a deck of tarot cards - tall, mysterious, elegant.

specific_pages.landing: Hero section must use the 'hero_background' with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/60) to make text pop. Headline: 'Love is worth the wait.'
specific_pages.chat: The AI persona is a 'Soul Companion'. Use the 'secondary' color (Electric Blue) for AI accents to differentiate from the 'primary' (Coral) love accents.
specific_pages.profile: Use large, immersive images. Text should overlay images with a gradient fade at the bottom.

universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'SaaS' layouts. No boring 3-column grids.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (brightness-110 or scale-105).
Dark mode is the ONLY mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
